column5: Just wanted to say,after watching the auction for Rick Over the years ,the site and its members have raise funds for families and individuals and situations OFC and its  members have shown once again what the gift of giving can trully be and make a Merry Xmas at all times of the year for those in need Truly a great collective display of the kindness and generosity in the gift of giving by all  Its actions like these that truly make the World Go Around    :clapping: :worthy:

....In many ways we truly have something unique here Marc. And if my memory serves me right you've always been there to offer up your services as well, for that I thank you personally. You and all the good folks here at OFC have shown time and time again what it means to be selfless.  My hats off to all who have given of themselves to help others.

I do agree fully whether it's an auction or just kind words and support this community is something special.  When my mom passed away almost 3 years ago many members reached out with words of support that helped.  As Rick's signature says PAY IT FORWARD it does seem to work.
It is the people, from the members to the Mods, to the founder that make OFC so special and so very different from most sites out there. We are family!
Yay we're special!  All kidding aside, there are great people on this board who do great things for others. Pay it forward has served well on here.
I couldn't agree more!  Everyone here has shown such great generosity and kindness towards everyone!  Happy holidays to all!!
Ditto, thanks for ALWAYS stepping up Marc!
Good too all..... is about all I can add to this.   Art
